Html: I notice that if you switch to HTML view in the editor it shows the HTML tags in UPPERCASE. To comply with the latest web standards should they not be in lowercase?

I think IE's innerHTML returns everything in uppercase here. You would find it displays in lowercase on firefox. You can always convert the tags on the server side before you save them to say your database.
